data.title: Best places to stay in Munster, Germany
data.meta_description: Find the best places to stay in Munster using our very fast highlights search
data.text:
Between Cologne and Hamburg, Münster is a lively city, almost entirely rebuilt after WW2, and now home to a vibrancy-inducing student population. There’s plenty of modern Germany to appreciate here but Münster also has some cultural treasures. Many of the best places to stay in Münster are close to the lively bar and restaurant areas of the city.

Things not to miss:

Bicycles are a big thing in Munster and the best way to explore the city.

Most of the main sights are within strolling distance within the old medieval walls, including the Peace Hall, many of the most visit-worthy churches and cathedrals.

Also go and see the man-made Aasee lake and the fantastic local museum, the Museum für Kunst and Kultur.

Despite much of the city being rebuilt last century, there are some survivors from bygone eras, including the charming shopping arcades of the Münster Arkaden, the impressive collection of Westphalian buildings of the open-air Mühlenhof-Freilichtmuseum and of course a number of the great churches.

Our pick of the best places to stay in Munster, may not be bang in the centre of town, but it is perfectly placed for exploring this city and enjoying its buzzy atmosphere.

The best places to stay in Munster

For contemporary chic

The Factory Hotel is a cutting edge, design hotel converted from a brewery. Now all the rooms are bright and white, with all the mod. cons. plus there are two restaurants and cocktail bar. And you can stay in this ‘lifestyle hub’ from as little as €89 per night.

For quiet relaxation

Set around beautiful historic cottages, Hotel Hof zur Linde is a charming, romantic spot. Just outside Munster, the hotel offers delightful rooms, a cosy bar and a superb restaurant. Explore Munster or while away the hours in the hotel's sublime spa.

For a self catering property

Explore the options at our online partner Booking.com.

Travel Information

Want to fly to Munster?

Fly into Munster Osnabruck Airport.

For car hire, visit our online partner Rentalcars.

The best time to visit Munster is from June to September, when the temperature sits comfortably in the twenties.
